resources.string: Quickly check your obesity level. Let’s start your journey to better health today!
Our model predicts a person\'s likelihood of being overweight or obese based on their lifestyle, habits, and physical characteristics.
Do you eat high caloric food frequently?(Red meat, nuts, milk, etc)
How many main meals do you have daily?
Has a family member suffered or suffers from overweight?
Do you eat any food/snack between meals?
Do you usually eat vegetables in your meals?
How often do you drink alcohol?
How much water do you drink daily?
Do you monitor the calories you eat daily?
How often do you have physical activity?
How much time do you use technological devices such as cell phone, video games, television, computer and others?
Which transportation do you usually use?
This mobile app uses your data and a pre-trained machine learning model to estimate one\'s likelihood of being overweight or obese. It also has a blog section with tips on staying it and healthy.
Make sure you are connected to the internet!
